verses.text: \w Put|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horn|strong="H7782"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*! \w An|strong="H3068"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* swoops \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*\f + \fr 8.1 \ft Heb. uncertain\f* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w trespassed|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w To|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H3045"\w* continually \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, ‘\w My|strong="H3045"\w* God, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*!’

\w But|strong="H2186"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* spurned \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w which|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, so let \w the|strong="H7291"\w* foe \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w him|strong="H7291"\w*. The Lord’s rejection of Israel’s rulers and idols

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w kings|strong="H4427"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* consent. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w princes|strong="H8323"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*. \w Out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* destruction!

\w Your|strong="H3808"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* idol, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w is|strong="H8111"\w* distasteful. \w My|strong="H3808"\w* anger \w is|strong="H8111"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w them|strong="H5704"\w*. \w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* escape punishment?

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*: \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w workman|strong="H2796"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w god|strong="H3808"\w*! \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*’s \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* mere splinters.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* shoot \w which|strong="H7307"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w stalk|strong="H7054"\w*, \w yields|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* fruit \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w yield|strong="H6213"\w*, \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* devour \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w devoured|strong="H1104"\w*. \w Already|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w lies|strong="H1961"\w* discarded \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worthless \w pot|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H5927"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* Assyria \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* \w donkey|strong="H6501"\w* \w which|strong="H1992"\w* wanders \w by|strong="H5927"\w* itself. Ephraim pays \w for|strong="H3588"\w* love

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* sell \w themselves|strong="H6908"\w* among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w round|strong="H1471"\w* \w them|strong="H2490"\w* \w up|strong="H6908"\w*. \w Soon|strong="H4592"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* writhe under \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4853"\w*!

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* Ephraim \w has|strong="H1961"\w* erected, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H7235"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinning|strong="H2398"\w*,

\w were|strong="H3644"\w* \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w for|strong="H2803"\w* \w him|strong="H3644"\w* ever \w so|strong="H3644"\w* many \w instructions|strong="H8451"\w*, \w they|strong="H3789"\w* \w would|strong="H2114"\w* \w be|strong="H2114"\w* \w regarded|strong="H2803"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* from \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H1320"\w* love \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, \w meat|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* eat \w it|strong="H7725"\w*, \w although|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pleased|strong="H7521"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*. \w Back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*!

\w For|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w forgot|strong="H7911"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w palaces|strong="H1964"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*. \w But|strong="H7911"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* devour \w her|strong="H7971"\w* strongholds.
